main event: A witness saw a bright, pulsating light in the sky which changed color and moved erratically over Chicopee, Massachusetts on August 15, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 2000-3000 feet.,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes.,The object disappeared behind clouds and was not seen again.,No sound was heard during the observation.,The witness could not determine the size, shape, or speed of the object.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
